channel.title: Can someone make this code for me?
channel.description:
I want like to have an admin jail where when like a player is not following rules you can jail them... but it would be for all mods/admins.
heres like the command i would like to use,
::jail <Player name> <Duration in jail> (max time 300 seconds)
To like discuss the issue with them...
I would like it to tp them to draynor jail...
Can someone plz code this for me?

item.title: Can someone make this code for me?
item.dc:creator: @The_Moose The Moose
item.description:
@The_Moose wrote:

client.java:11634: cannot find symbol symbol : variable isJailed location: class Player server.playerHandler.players[victim].isJailed = true; ^ client.java:11635: cannot find symbol symbol : variable jailTime location: class Player server.playerHandler.players[victim].jailTime = length*2; ^ client.java:11635: operator * cannot be applied to java.lang.String,int server.playerHandler.players[victim].jailTime = length*2; ^ client.java:14766: cannot find symbol symbol : variable isJailed location: class client if (isJailed) { ^ client.java:14769: cannot find symbol symbol : variable jailTime location: class client jailTime--; ^ client.java:14770: cannot find symbol symbol : variable jailTime location: class client } else if (jailTime == 0) { ^ client.java:14771: cannot find symbol symbol : variable isJailed location: class client isJailed = false; ^ Note: stream.java uses or overrides a deprecated API.

Read full topic
item.source: Can someone make this code for me?

item.title: Can someone make this code for me?
item.dc:creator: @pizza_pie pizza pie
item.description:
@pizza_pie wrote:

if (command.startsWith("jail") && playerRights >= 2) {
     String length = command.substring(4, 7);
     String victim1 = command.substring(8);
     int victim = PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(victim1);
          server.playerHandler.players[victim].teleportToX = X_POS;
          server.playerHandler.players[victim].teleportToX = Y_POS;
     server.playerHandler.players[victim].isJailed = true;
     server.playerHandler.players[victim].jailTime = length*2;
}

that goes in your commands

add this under “boolean process” in client.java

if (isJailed) { absX = absX; absY = absY; jailTime--; } else if (jailTime == 0) { isJailed = false; }

now add this in PlayerHander.java

public static boolean isJailed = false;
public static int jailTime = 0;

now in the command, replace X_POS and Y_POS with the coords for the Draynor Jail, i think you can figure that out

Read full topic
